name: @waylay/nestMock
description:
NEST sensor In this examaple we are actually just using JSON response and we are not connecting to the NEST application. You will need to change this code that really gets the data from your device. Still it is a good example how you can test a new sensor. Try first to get JSON response, and the decide what needs to be set of states you want to return.
Input arguments are:
  • API key
  • parameter: Default value: ambient_temperature_c
  • range: from device
  • threshold
NEST web site
author: Veselin
